overview:
Stephanie is an expert on the intersection of law and social media.

Moewe co-founded GetPervasiv in 2010, which was acquired by SIX Intel in 2011. As a founding executive of SIX Intel, Stephanie has blazed trails by defining the methods and best practices for the mining and delivery of social intelligence to the sales professional.

Stephanie earned her Juris Doctor with honors and combines a background in marketing with her experience as a practicing attorney to help SIX Intel navigate the evolving areas of Internet privacy and internet law. She is also responsible for leading SIX Intel’s curation team.
